Description.UIName: Climb the Aggro Crag: Rattler Fight!
Description.Name: Climb the Aggro Crag: Rattler Fight!
Description.Details: This item lets you spawn a specialized contract where you fight against a Rattler Mobile Fortress, complete with its escorting mech forces. This item immediately generates a special contract on the planet of purchase against a Rattler Mobile Fortress. THIS CONTRACT IS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT, PROBABLY UNWINNABLE WITHOUT EXTREME MEASURES, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
